category.Name: category
category.Description: Type of plan. 736378000 should be used to search for oncology CarePlans.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Patient FHIR resource ID for the patient associated with the care plan.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The status of the care plan.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

CarePlan.Name: CarePlan
CarePlan.Description: An instance of the R4 CarePlan resource.

activity.Name: activity
activity.Description: Actions to occur as part of the care plan.

location.Name: location
location.Description: Reference to the treatment department resource

reference.Name: reference
reference.Description: Reference to RequestGroup resource for day-level information (applicable to cycle-level CarePlan only).

category.Name: category
category.Description: Plan type and episode type (applicable to plan-level CarePlan only).

intent.Name: intent
intent.Description: For oncology CarePlans, this always equals "plan".

partOf.Name: partOf
partOf.Description: Refers to the plan-level CarePlan resource (applicable to cycle-level CarePlan only).

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient or subject of this care plan.
